verses.verse: And<WG2532> when<WG3753> he had opened<WG455> the seventh<WG1442> seal<WG4973>, there was<WG1096> silence<WG4602> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> about<WG5613> the space of half an hour<WG2256>.
And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> which<WG3739> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> God<WG2316>; and<WG2532> to them<WG846> were given<WG1325> seven<WG2033> trumpets<WG4536>.

And<WG2532> another<WG243> angel<WG32> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> stood<WG2476> at<WG1909> the altar<WG2379>, having<WG2192> a golden<WG5552> censer<WG3031>; and<WG2532> there was given<WG1325> to him<WG846> much<WG4183> incense<WG2368>, that<WG2443> he should offer<WG1325> it with the prayers<WG4335> of all<WG3956> saints<WG40> upon<WG1909> the golden<WG5552> altar<WG2379> which was<WG3588> before<WG1799> the throne<WG2362>.

And<WG2532> the smoke<WG2586> of the incense<WG2368>, which came with the prayers<WG4335> of the saints<WG40>, ascended up<WG305> before<WG1799> God<WG2316> out<WG1537> of the angel<WG32>'s hand<WG5495>.

And<WG2532> the angel<WG32> took<WG2983> the censer<WG3031>, and<WG2532> filled<WG1072> it<WG846> with fire<WG4442> of<WG1537> the altar<WG2379>, and<WG2532> cast<WG906> it into<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>: and<WG2532> there were<WG1096> voices<WG5456>, and<WG2532> thunderings<WG1027>, and<WG2532> lightnings<WG796>, and<WG2532> an earthquake<WG4578>.
And<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> which had<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> trumpets<WG4536> prepared<WG2090> themselves<WG1438> to<WG2443> sound<WG4537>.

The<WG2532> first<WG4413> angel<WG32> sounded<WG4537>, and<WG2532> there followed<WG1096> hail<WG5464> and<WG2532> fire<WG4442> mingled<WG3396> with blood<WG129>, and<WG2532> they were cast<WG906> upon<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>: and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of trees<WG1186> was burnt up<WG2618>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> green<WG5515> grass<WG5528> was burnt up<WG2618>.

And<WG2532> the second<WG1208> angel<WG32> sounded<WG4537>, and<WG2532> as it were<WG5613> a great<WG3173> mountain<WG3735> burning<WG2545> with fire<WG4442> was cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>: and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the sea<WG2281> became<WG1096> blood<WG129>;

And<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the creatures<WG2938> which were<WG3588> in<WG1722> the sea<WG2281>, and had<WG2192> life<WG5590>, died<WG599>; and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the ships<WG4143> were destroyed<WG1311>.

And<WG2532> the third<WG5154> angel<WG32> sounded<WG4537>, and<WG2532> there fell<WG4098> a great<WG3173> star<WG792> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, burning<WG2545> as it were<WG5613> a lamp<WG2985>, and<WG2532> it fell<WG4098> upon<WG1909> the third part<WG5154> of the rivers<WG4215>, and<WG2532> upon<WG1909> the fountains<WG4077> of waters<WG5204>;

And<WG2532> the name<WG3686> of the star<WG792> is called<WG3004> Wormwood<WG894>: and<WG2532> the third<WG5154> part of the waters<WG5204> became<WG1096><WG99999> wormwood<WG894>; and<WG2532> many<WG4183> men<WG444> died<WG599> of<WG1537> the waters<WG5204>, because<WG3754> they were made bitter<WG4087>.

And<WG2532> the fourth<WG5067> angel<WG32> sounded<WG4537>, and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the sun<WG2246> was struck<WG4141>, and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the moon<WG4582>, and<WG2532> the third part<WG5154> of the stars<WG792>; so as<WG2443> the third part<WG5154> of them<WG846> was darkened<WG4654>, and<WG2532> the day<WG2250> shone<WG5316> not<WG3361> for a third part<WG5154> of it<WG846>, and<WG2532> the night<WG3571> likewise<WG3668>.

And<WG2532> I looked<WG1492>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191> an<WG1520> angel<WG32> flying<WG4072> through<WG1722> the midst of heaven<WG3321>, saying<WG3004> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, Woe<WG3759>, woe<WG3759>, woe<WG3759>, to the inhabiters<WG2730> of<WG1909> the earth<WG1093> by reason<WG1537> of the other<WG3062> voices<WG5456> of the trumpet<WG4536> of the three<WG5140> angels<WG32>, which<WG3588> are yet<WG3195> to sound<WG4537>!
